episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4001:
Bwahaha! This is what happens when you try to
stand against us!
Now! Surrender your—
Stop right there!
That’s enough of you all running wild.
Heh, another chump shows up.

You’d better get ready to hand over
your Pokémon!
Th-these kids are strong!
Grr... Interrupting us at the worst time!
Nice moves!
You too, Serena.
Aw, man... They bested us…
We’re not strong enough to beat them...
But there’s no point being sad, right?

As long as you train so you don’t lose
next time—
It’ll all be OK!

You’re not alone! You have a lot of friends here
on Pasio who are by your side!

Let’s all get stronger together, along with our
precious partner Pokémon!
Stronger together...

Instead of fighting alone, I can get stronger by
battling alongside my partner and the people
around me...
Yeah! We’re all in this together!
O-OK!
We can do it!
Well done!

You encouraged those heart-stricken Trainers and
got them back on their feet. Color me impressed.

I’m preparing an event that’s perfect for
sync pairs like you two, so be prepared!

Young master, let’s take these Team Break
members away before they act out again.
Yes, let’s.
An event that’s perfect for us?
I wonder what it could be!

(Serena was the one who gave those discouraged
Trainers hope...)

(She’s not just strong in battle. She has that spark
in her heart.)
(But what do I have?)
(Am I a Trainer worthy of being her rival?)
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/6801:
We’re gonna climb our
way all the way up to the
champion title!

We have the same goal: we’re going to keep
getting stronger...
I’m going to be stronger than you, Serena.
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4002: Do you want to beat Serena?
Lear said he has something he wants to tell us!
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4003: Let me tell you why I summoned you both here!

I would like to invite you to participate in the Neo
Champion Stadium!
Neo...Champion Stadium?

Is it different from the Champion Stadium we’ve
had up to now?

The truly mighty are not only strong—they also
serve as an example for everyone else to measure
up against.

To spread this idea, I’m looking for sync pairs that
instill hope in others...

Thus, I’m hosting a tournament to decide who to
crown the Neo Champion of Pasio!
The Champions here will give you the finer details.
Sure.
Let me start by explaining our position.

In this tournament, we, the Champions from each
region, will be participating as judges,
not competitors.

For each tournament, one of us will be chosen as
the head judge who decides the judging criteria of
that tournament.

Each tournament... That means there’ll be more
than one tournament to decide a champion?
Precisely.

The tournament will be held again and again with
different judging criteria.

We, the judges, will discuss amongst ourselves
who has met our criteria for each tournament...

and award the title Neo Champion of Pasio to
those who’ve shown they qualify.

Just because you’re good at Pokémon battling
doesn’t mean you’ll become the champion!

You’ll have to show us that your actions are
befitting of the champion title by meeting the
judging criteria!

Unlike the Champions of the Pokémon League
or PML...

“Neo Champion” is a title for a Trainer who acts
as an example of what everyone should measure
up to.
Which means more than one person could qualify.
Basically, anyone has a chance to be a champion!
Now listen...

For this monumental first tournament, the head
judge will be Diantha, the Champion of the
Kalos region.

I wanted to see the two of you shine, so I made
sure you both were invited.

So how about it? Will you take part in
this tournament?
Of course I will!
Me too.

It’s also a good chance to settle things
with Serena...

Serena... I’m going to beat you and become the
Neo Champion of Pasio.
I’ll see you in the finals!
Of course! I’ll be looking forward to it!
Now then...
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4004:
I know I talked the talk, but with my usual
training, I won’t be able to beat Serena...
Hello there, young boy from Kalos.
You seem like you’re very fired up.
Would you like to train with me?

Are you sure? Is it OK for a judge to help out a
participant?
Oh, it’s not a problem at all.

I was only there as the advisor for the current
Unova Champion, Iris.
I’m slightly different from the other judges.
But why would you help me?

Why, I just saw some youngsters with fighting
spirit burning in their hearts, and I got a bit fired
up myself!
Looks like your partner Pokémon’s up for it!
It’s rare to get an opportunity like this.
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4005: Impressive skills.

You’ll have no trouble advancing through the main
tournament if you keep this up.
Thank you!
It’s an honor to be trained by you, Cynthia!

The judges said that just winning battles doesn’t
mean you can be champion...

Knowing Diantha, I wonder if they’ll be judging us
on how well we can act.
Maybe. I’m not sure.
Would you like to beat Calem?
Of course!

I’ve battled Calem many times since we left
Vaniville Town together.

I’m always pushing myself so I don’t lose to
Calem, who’s always serious.

Calem is the best rival. He’s the reason I was able
to get this strong!

It’s wonderful that you have a rival to
compete against.

You can battle him seriously without holding back
because he’s strong and you respect him.
Let’s move on to the next training!
Your next opponent is...
Clang!
My Steel-type Pokémon and I are here to help!
Now! Try to break through her Pokémon’s defense!
Cynthia sure doesn’t pull any punches...

But I have to work this hard if I want to
beat Calem!
OK, let’s do this, Jasmine!
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4006: Yes! Good job, Greninja!
Indeed! That’s the spirit!
By the way, what is it that drives you so much?
The title of champion?
Of course I’d like to be champion...
But it’s not just the title I care about.
I just...don’t want to lose to Serena.

I’ve battled Serena so many times in Kalos, and
each time, I’ve felt disappointed in myself.

Through battling her, I’ve realized that she’s not
just my neighbor...
I’ve started to see her as my true rival.

I wanted to remember my journey in Kalos
with Greninja...

So I partnered up with him as a way to start a
new journey.
A rival you can’t lose to, huh...

Say, Calem, what do you think about the Neo
Champion Stadium?

Holding the tournament again and again, changing
the head judge each time...

And in each tournament, those who prove
themselves worthy will get the title of
Neo Champion.
What do you think is the meaning of that?

I guess it means...that it’s better to have more
Trainers who can be an example to others?
That’s one reason. But there’s more to it than that.
Once, I lost to a Trainer with true convictions...

And that Trainer clashed head-on with another
Trainer with different convictions...
Then both of them became true heroes.
My convictions and their convictions...

They were all true beliefs. There’s no way to say
one is better than the others.

Seeing those convictions come together and
compete with each other can give courage to
those who are watching.
That’s what I believe.
Those words really mean something to me.

I used to compare myself to others to see who
was better...
That’s all I used to care about.
But that doesn’t matter to me now.

I want to face Serena with my true feelings...
And I want to win!
It seems you both were lucky to meet each other.
What’s the next training, Alder?
I’ve got it!

I’ve asked someone special to come here to
battle you.
Hiya! Your big sister Acerola is here!

You’re doing some serious training! I can help you
out with that!
Acerola...
I might take you up on that offer, Big Sis!

I’ve become stronger by meeting all sorts of
people and Pokémon throughout my journey.
I’m gonna hit Serena with all I’ve got!
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4007:
We will now hold the tournament to decide the
Neo Champion of Pasio...

I, Diantha, Champion of the Kalos region, will be
the head judge for this tournament!

Everyone should know that this tournament’s
purpose isn’t just to decide the strongest sync pair.

There’s something I care about more than wins
or losses.

What I want to see is how you shine as a
sync pair!

I will bestow the title of Neo Champion upon the
sync pairs who show me they shine brilliantly!

Every participant should battle in a way that
leaves no regrets at the end.
And now...let the Neo Champion Stadium begin!
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4008:
Now, it’s time for the Neo Champion Stadium
finals!

The battle of the century—between Serena and
Calem—is about to begin!
In order to win this tournament, I can’t lose here.
But more importantly...I don’t want to lose to you.
I can’t lose either.
You’re my friend, my comrade, my neighbor...
And my best rival.
Ready for this?
En garde!
Let’s win, Greninja!
No, we’re gonna win!
Greninja...
Did we win?
I beat...Serena?
You’re definitely my best rival.
Congratulations, Calem.
That was a truly excellent battle, you two.
Each sync pair showed me a brilliant shine!

As I mentioned at the start, my focus for this
tournament was how brightly you shine.

And more than one sync pair showed me a
shining bond!

Sync pairs who share that light and compete with
each other create an infinite shine.

This time, two Trainers who displayed this
wonderful shine...
will be receiving the title of Neo Champion!
What?!
But Calem won the battle...

Serena... I’d like you to receive the title of Neo
Champion as well.

Without you, I wouldn’t have gotten as strong as I
am now.
That’s why I’d like to share this pleasure with you.
In fact, I think it’s the right thing to do.
OK, understood.
episode_event_champion_serena_calme/4009:
The Trainers who have won the honor to be
crowned Neo Champion of this tournament are...
these two!
I’ll continue to count on you, neighbor.
